description: Stylesheet for a React application that manages light and dark theme colors, layout, and animations for various components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with centered text and responsive design.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application with styling for layout and colors based on theme.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application that adapts based on the theme.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes, styled for accessibility and interactivity.
